title-group.article-title: Using an Expert System with Inductive Learning to Evaluate Business Loans

abstract.p: A knowledge-based artificial intelligence (AI) system called MARBLE has been developed to evaluate the riskiness of business loan applicants. A unique feature of MARBLE is that is has the capacity to learn. The AI system thus uses inference rules to simulate the thought process of a lending officer when evaluating a loan request.

p.mixed-citation: Dai- ichi Kanygo Bank in Japan [22]
